# attributeOptions

**Instance Property**

Options relating to the attributes of the transcription appropriate for this preset.

## Declaration

```swift
var attributeOptions: Set<SpeechTranscriber.ResultAttributeOption>
```

## Getting preset properties

- **reportingOptions**: Options relating to the transcriber’s result delivery appropriate for this preset.
- **transcriptionOptions**: Options relating to the text of the transcription appropriate for this preset.
